name: Matchmaker Or Heart Breaker?
description:
"MOHB" - Matchmaker Or Heart Breaker?

The main player uses "Cupid's bow"  by Contring the slider interface

There are 2 halves of the heart that enter the screen in a mirror image. The player must be able to hit both of them to unite them to become a whole heart. 

At the same time the player should avoid being hurt by the tears of a broken heart

Good luck! & I hope  you will succeed in spreading a lot of love
